Hi All,

Boost (boost.naturalint.com) will be deployed at 10:50

Impacted services:

Renderer, Boost, CMS
Motivation: Editor score variant inheritance 

During the deployment there may be short service interruption.
Users may experience periodic slow response time / 50X / fail requests / publishes errors (rarely).

Rollback: in case of a fatal/major error occurring, and without a quick solution we will rollback within up to an hour.

incidents.name: Abie temporary issue - displayed an error message when trying to calculate significance underBayesian method

incident_updates.body:
**UPDATE**
Hi, 
The root cause of this issue was that ML team accidently directed traffic to ABie Staging instead of Production. 

------------------
Hi All,
Please note we had a temporary issue on Abie. 
When trying to calculate significance under the Bayesian method, Abie displayed an error - "Failed to execute data science API due to: 503 Service Temporarily Unavailable".
Currently this issue is resolved. 
An update regarding the root cause of this issue will be sent once available.
The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Dear All,

On 7/1 we plan to upgrade Tableau to version 19.4
The upgrade will start at 17:00 with first step of backups and no down time planned.
Down time might occur from 18:00 to 20:00
Service effect: During this maintenance Periodic service interruptions are expected

We will followup on the maintenance progress and update with status updates.

With any question please reach out to support@naturalint.com.
The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

incidents.name: Anodot Adgroups Hourly Stats  /  Campaigns Hourly Stats Streams are not updated since 29.12

incident_updates.body:
Incident has been resolved.

The root cause is  due to a bug on  our end related to Time zone  adaptation which updated year 2020 on 2019 data. All the corrupted files have been restored and the stream was enabled back.

The issue is resolved effective 1/1 ~21:00

We will add relevant alert to identify stream data not being updated.

With any issue please reach out to support@naturalint.com

Hi All,

Effective 29.12 Anodot Adgroups Hourly Stats  +  Campaigns Hourly Stats Streams are not updated are not updated.

Root cause related to a bug on our side and issue is being reviewed by Data dev teams.

The impact on users is that no Anomalies will be flagged whil the Data stream is not refreshed.

TS ticket: https://jira.naturalint.com/browse/TS-8913

UPDATE:
The rollback process is done  - data apps team reverted it back to experiments-backend version.
http://experiments.production.naturalint.com/app/bayesian
The service is accessible on http and not https.
According to Chen, a fix for https://abie.naturalint.com/  will be deployed today.

Hi All,
Please note that currently Abie (abie.naturalint.com) is failing to load.
The root cause is that a SSL version was uploaded by Data-Apps team and currently it doesn't work properly.
Therefore Data-Apps team are working on a rollback to the older version. 
This issue should be resolved after the rollback is done and after refreshing cache. 
ETA for the issue to be resolved is ~2 hours.
The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
